author: AlexLynn “Ally” Marone
description: An after-dinner/late-night sipper which benefits from a split whisk(e)y base and similarly split fortified wines and liqueurs. Some will prefer served in an old-fashioned glass over a large ice cube.
name: Towser the Mouser
recipeIngredient: 15 ml Speyside single malt Scotch whisky

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
